org.opendaylight.controller.statisticsmanager

Interface IStatisticsManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatisticsManager

    public interface IStatisticsManager
    Interface which defines the available methods for retrieving the network nodes statistics.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<FlowOnNode> getFlows(Node node)
      Return all the statistics for all the flows present on the specified node in the current container context.
      java.util.List<FlowOnNode> getFlowsNoCache(Node node)
      Same as the getFlows method.
      int getFlowsNumber(Node node)
      Returns the number of flows installed on the switch in the current container context If the context is the default container, the returned value is the number of all the flows installed on the switch regardless of the container they belong to
      java.util.Map<Node,java.util.List<FlowOnNode>> getFlowStatisticsForFlowList(java.util.List<FlowEntry> flows)
      Returns the statistics for the flows specified in the list
      java.util.List<NodeConnectorStatistics> getNodeConnectorStatistics(Node node)
      Returns the statistics for all the node connector present on the specified network node
      NodeConnectorStatistics getNodeConnectorStatistics(NodeConnector nodeConnector)
      Returns the statistics for the specified node connector as it was retrieved by the protocol plugin component and cached by statistics manager.
      NodeDescription getNodeDescription(Node node)
      Returns the node description for the specified node retrieved by the protocol plugin component and cached by statistics manager.
      java.util.List<NodeTableStatistics> getNodeTableStatistics(Node node)
      Returns the statistics for all the tables of the node
      NodeTableStatistics getNodeTableStatistics(NodeTable nodeTable)
      Returns the statistics for the specified table of the node

    • Method Detail

      • getFlows

        java.util.List<FlowOnNode> getFlows(Node node)
        Return all the statistics for all the flows present on the specified node in the current container context. If the context is the default container, the returned statistics are for all the flows installed on the node, regardless of the container they belong to
        Parameters:
        node - The network node
        Returns:
        List of flows installed on the network node. Null if specified node is null. Empty list if node/stat is not present.

      • getFlowsNoCache

        java.util.List<FlowOnNode> getFlowsNoCache(Node node)
        Same as the getFlows method. The only difference is that this method does not return cached flows. It will always make a request to the node to get all the flows for that node. If the request times out or gets an error, we revert to getting the cached flows.
        Parameters:
        node -
        Returns:
        List of flows installed on the network node.
        See Also:
        getFlows(org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Node)

      • getFlowStatisticsForFlowList

        java.util.Map<Node,java.util.List<FlowOnNode>> getFlowStatisticsForFlowList(java.util.List<FlowEntry> flows)
        Returns the statistics for the flows specified in the list
        Parameters:
        flows -
        Returns:
        A map of flows per node installed on that node, empty map if flows is null/empty.

      • getFlowsNumber

        int getFlowsNumber(Node node)
        Returns the number of flows installed on the switch in the current container context If the context is the default container, the returned value is the number of all the flows installed on the switch regardless of the container they belong to
        Parameters:
        node -
        Returns:
        number of flows on specified node or (-1) if node was not found

      • getNodeDescription

        NodeDescription getNodeDescription(Node node)
        Returns the node description for the specified node retrieved by the protocol plugin component and cached by statistics manager. Null if node not found.
        Parameters:
        node -
        Returns:
        node description

      • getNodeConnectorStatistics

        NodeConnectorStatistics getNodeConnectorStatistics(NodeConnector nodeConnector)
        Returns the statistics for the specified node connector as it was retrieved by the protocol plugin component and cached by statistics manager.
        Parameters:
        node -
        Returns:
        Node connector statistics or null if requested stats was not found.

      • getNodeConnectorStatistics

        java.util.List<NodeConnectorStatistics> getNodeConnectorStatistics(Node node)
        Returns the statistics for all the node connector present on the specified network node
        Parameters:
        node -
        Returns:
        List of node connector statistics. Null if node is null. Empty list if node/stats is not present.

      • getNodeTableStatistics

        NodeTableStatistics getNodeTableStatistics(NodeTable nodeTable)
        Returns the statistics for the specified table of the node
        Parameters:
        nodeTable -
        Returns:
        Table statistics. Null if node table is null or stats not found.

      • getNodeTableStatistics

        java.util.List<NodeTableStatistics> getNodeTableStatistics(Node node)
        Returns the statistics for all the tables of the node
        Parameters:
        nodeTable -
        Returns:
        List of table stats. Null if node is null. Empty list if node/stats not found.
